snippet.title: Blades of Fire | Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Introducing Blades of Fire, an all-new action adventure from the team at MercurySteam and 505 Games.
 
Join Aran de Lira, firstborn of the King’s Ward, on a journey to find the real purpose of his fate.
 
Develop your forging skills, craft a series of weapons to suit your style and get ready to embrace a unique combat system as you take on Queen Nerea’s fierce enemies.
 
Aran de Lira, only you can forge your legend!
 
Blades of Fire launches May 22, 2025 on Epic Games Store.
 
Pre-Purchase Now!
